TikTokPy

Tooling that automates your social media interactions to ‚Äúfarm‚Äù Likes and Followers on TikTok

---## Quickstart.py```pythonimport asynciofrom tiktokpy import TikTokPyasync def main(): async with TikTokPy() as bot: # Do you want to get trending videos? You can! trending_items = await bot.trending(amount=5) for item in trending_items: # ‚ù§Ô∏è you can like videos await bot.like(item) # or unlike them await bot.unlike(item) # or follow users await bot.follow(item.author.username) # as and unfollow await bot.unfollow(item.author.username) # üòè getting user's feed user_feed_items = await bot.user_feed(username="justinbieber", amount=5) for item in user_feed_items: # üéß get music title, cover, link, author name.. print("Music title: ", item.music.title) # #Ô∏è‚É£ print all tag's title of video print([tag.title for tag in item.challenges]) # üìà check all video stats print("Comments: ", item.stats.comments) print("Plays: ", item.stats.plays) print("Shares: ", item.stats.shares) print("Likes: ", item.stats.likes) # and many other things üòâasyncio.run(main())```## InstallationInstall with pip:```shellpip install tiktokpy```Install browser by playwright```shellplaywright install chromium```If you have little to no knowledge in programming: Read this Guide ["How to use TiktokPy Python Bot"](https://my-tailwind-nextjs-starter-blog.vercel.app/blog/how-to-use-tiktokpy-for-beginner-programmers-indepth-guide) for beginners## RunTo create your cookies and settings.toml file simply run```shellpython quicklogin.py```and then after you login run```shellpython quickstart.py```
